speedswim.description: The speed the object moves at.

waitfruit.description: Determines if the turtle waits for a fruit object to be activated.

waitride.description: Determines if the turtle waits for the player before following a spline.

pathname.description: Name of the spline in a PATH file for the object to follow.

DrawDistance.description: How close the object needs to be to the player before spawning.

ObjName.description: The internal name of the object.
